meanings.sent1: The theatregoers enjoyed the play last night.
meanings.sent2: Many theatregoers gathered outside the theater before the show.
meanings.sent3: The theatregoers chuckled at the funny scenes in the play.
meanings.sent4: Theatregoers are like eager bees buzzing around a hive of creativity.
meanings.sent5: The image of theatregoers eagerly taking their seats is etched in my mind.

meanings.definition: Those who go to see plays or other performances in a theater.
meanings.sent1: The theatregoers applauded loudly at the end of the performance.
meanings.sent2: After the show, the theatregoers chatted excitedly about the actors.
meanings.sent3: The theatregoers playfully argued about their favorite characters in the play.
meanings.sent4: In the sea of faces, the theatregoers stood out like stars in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: Theatregoers bring life to the theater with their presence and reactions.
